projects.taskHub: A full-stack task management app with user authentication, drag-and-drop interface, and MongoDB-based persistence. Built with React, TypeScript, Node.js, and Tailwind.
projects.mgk: A minimal and responsive gallery of cute cats built with React and Tailwind. Features a clean UI and light interactivity.
projects.skillshare: The application allows users to post advertisements offering their skills and services. It includes user authentication and registration, the ability to add, edit, and delete ads, view other usersâ€™ profiles, chat with them, and choose the interface language. It is built using Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and MongoDB.
